verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee: make <S%H2363>haste<s%> unto me; give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee.

Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be set <S%H3559>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee as <S%H7004>incense;<s%> and the lifting <S%H4864>up<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> as the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice.<s%>
Set <S%H7896><s%> a <S%H8108>watch,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> before my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

Incline <S%H5186><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to any <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to <S%H5953>practice<s%> <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H5949>works<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity:<s%> and let me <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3898>eat<s%> of their <S%H4516>dainties.<s%>

Let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1986>smite<s%> me; it shall be a <S%H2617>kindness:<s%> and let him <S%H3198>reprove<s%> me; it shall be an <S%H7218>excellent<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> which shall <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5106>break<s%> my <S%H7218>head:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> also shall be in their <S%H7451>calamities.<s%>
When their <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H8058>overthrown<s%> in <S%H5553>stony<s%> <S%H3027>places,<s%> they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H561>words;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they are <S%H5276>sweet.<s%>

Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6340>scattered<s%> at the <S%H7585>grave's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> as <S%H3644>when<s%> one <S%H6398>cutteth<s%> and <S%H1234>cleaveth<s%> wood upon the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, O <S%H3069>GOD<s%> the <S%H136>Lord:<s%> in thee is my <S%H2620>trust;<s%> leave not my soul <S%H6168>destitute.<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H5315><s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H6341>snares<s%> which they have <S%H3369>laid<s%> for me, and the <S%H4170>gins<s%> of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> into their own <S%H4364>nets,<s%> <S%H5704>whilst<s%> that <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3162>withal<s%> <S%H5674>escape.<s%>
